remarks: The union of a nonempty set of filters with a common base and closed under pairwise union is a filter.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Nov-2013.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
statement:
filuni $p |- ( ( F C_ ( Fil ` X ) /\ F =/= (/) /\ A. f e. F A. g e. F ( f u. g ) e. F ) -> U. F e. ( Fil ` X ) ) $.
$d F f g $.
$d X f g $.
